title: Smoothed instrumental variables quantile regression. (arXiv:2310.09013v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: In this article, I introduce the sivqr command, which estimates the coefficients of the instrumental variables (IV) quantile regression model introduced by Chernozhukov and Hansen (2005). The sivqr command offers several advantages over the existing ivqreg and ivqreg2 commands for estimating this IV quantile regression model, which complements the alternative "triangular model" behind cqiv and the "local quantile treatment effect" model of ivqte. Computationally, sivqr implements the smoothed estimator of Kaplan and Sun (2017), who show that smoothing improves both computation time and statistical accuracy. Standard errors are computed analytically or by Bayesian bootstrap; for non-iid sampling, sivqr is compatible with bootstrap. I discuss syntax and the underlying methodology, and I compare sivqr with other commands in an example.

Title: Smoothed instrumental variables quantile regression. (arXiv:2310.09013v1 [econ.EM])
Abstract: In this article, I introduce the sivqr command, which estimates the coefficients of the instrumental variables (IV) quantile regression model introduced by Chernozhukov and Hansen (2005). The sivqr command offers several advantages over the existing ivqreg and ivqreg2 commands for estimating this IV quantile regression model, which complements the alternative "triangular model" behind cqiv and the "local quantile treatment effect" model of ivqte. Computationally, sivqr implements the smoothed estimator of Kaplan and Sun (2017), who show that smoothing improves both computation time and statistical accuracy. Standard errors are computed analytically or by Bayesian bootstrap; for non-iid sampling, sivqr is compatible with bootstrap. I discuss syntax and the underlying methodology, and I compare sivqr with other commands in an example.
translated_title: 平滑的工具变量分位数回归
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了sivqr命令，该命令用于估计由Chernozhukov和Hansen (2005)引入的工具变量(IV)分位数回归模型的系数。与现有的ivqreg和ivqreg2命令相比，sivqr命令在估计该IV分位数回归模型方面具有几个优势。在计算方面，sivqr实现了Kaplan和Sun (2017)的平滑估计器，他们证明平滑能够提高计算时间和统计精度。标准误差通过解析方法或贝叶斯bootstrap计算；对于非独立同分布采样，sivqr与bootstrap兼容。文章讨论了语法和基本方法，并在一个例子中将sivqr与其他命令进行了比较。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种平滑的工具变量分位数回归模型估计方法，改进了计算时间和统计精度。该方法可以用于处理IV分位数回归模型，并与其他方法进行了比较。
